# Workflow {.unnumbered}

### The Bible
[The Turing Way handbook to reproducible, ethical and collaborative data science](https://the-turing-way.netlify.app)

### Overview

SQL, R or Python for scripts

Git for version control

Code notebooks for development and publication  

Code review  

All analysis gets an identifier (DOI)

Research shared openly (Github, MedRxiv, blogs, etc)

### Record Keeping

Keep daily tasks log  

Pass brag-sheet highlights upwards  

Contribute to quarterly report  

Impact log
